link.title: MVSD - "It's a matter of PRIDE!"
link.script:

SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */ var b=function(){this.c=""};b.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeScript{"+this.c+"}"};b.prototype.a=function(a){this.c=a};(new b).a("");var c=function(){this.g=""};c.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyle{"+this.g+"}"};c.prototype.a=function(a){this.g=a};(new c).a("");var d=function(){this.f=""};d.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyleSheet{"+this.f+"}"};d.prototype.a=function(a){this.f=a};(new d).a("");var e=function(){this.b=""};e.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeHtml{"+this.b+"}"};e.prototype.a=function(a){this.b=a};(new e).a("");(new e).a("");(new e).a("
");}).call(this);

h2.div: MVSD - Remote Learning - Monday, March 16, 2020 through Friday, May 1, 2020

ul.li: COVID-19 - Resources | MVSD and SAU #46 advisories
We're looking for your feedback (Remote Learning and April Break) - click here
Online Video Chat Etiquette - Family Edition - click here
Click here to apply online for free and reduced lunch/breakfast

Parents are urged to complete the application in cases of either reduced income levels or unemployment situations. The application is reviewed according to federal guidelines and held in strict confidentiality
If you have questions or problems, please contact Chris Michael or Wendy LaClair at 753-1420 or wlaclair@mvsdpride.org

div.p: This document serves as a proactive communication and planning device for the MVSD and its communities. This document is a continual work in progress and certain aspects may change. Any changes will be reflected automatically in the link above.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-R6PoUb purZT-AhqUyc-R6PoUb pSzOP-AhqUyc-R6PoUb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-zQtlcf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Bullying is an extraordinarily important topic facing students, parents, families, and schools. The MVSD is committed to increasing awareness and education, while proactively partnering with our constituents to end bullying. The following link leads you to a website that provides definitions, processes, and helpful resources in this effort.

h3.div: Read the press release from the NHSAA.
